title: The Nazi on the run
itunes:title: The Nazi on the run
itunes:subtitle: The author and barrister Philippe Sands discusses the incredible story of Otto von Wächter, which forms the basis of his new BBC podcast and Radio 4 series, Intrigue: The Ratline
description:
The author and barrister Philippe Sands discusses the incredible story of Otto von Wächter, which forms the basis of his new BBC podcast and Radio 4 series, Intrigue: The Ratline

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
